DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Test Result Positive Finding Or Indeterminate Finding Verification Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether a positive or indeterminate finding was verified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Test Result Positive Finding Or Indeterminate Finding Verification
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test._A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._Support or establish by evidence or proof.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Property.preferredName: Positive Finding Or Indeterminate Finding Verification
Property.preferredDefinition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.:Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.:Support or establish by evidence or proof.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.
Support or establish by evidence or proof.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
